quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.quote: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.quote: The best error message is the one that never shows up.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuchs

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
quotes.author: Austin Freeman

quotes.quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
quotes.author: Ralph Johnson

quotes.quote: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.quote: Clean code always looks like it was written by someone who cares.
quotes.author: Robert C. Martin

quotes.quote: It's not a bug – it's an undocumented feature.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Fix the cause, not the symptom.
quotes.author: Steve Maguire

quotes.quote: Code never lies, comments sometimes do.
quotes.author: Ron Jeffries

quotes.quote: Deleted code is debugged code.
quotes.author: Jeff Sickel

quotes.quote: There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation and naming things.
quotes.author: Phil Karlton

quotes.quote: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen.
quotes.author: Edward V. Berard

quotes.quote: The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
quotes.author: Harold Abelson

quotes.quote: Truth can only be found in one place: the code.
quotes.author: Robert C. Martin

quotes.quote: Optimism is an occupational hazard of programming: feedback is the treatment.
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.quote: One of my most productive days was throwing away 1000 lines of code.
quotes.author: Ken Thompson

quotes.quote: Don't comment bad code – rewrite it.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.
quotes.author: Grady Booch

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In programming, the hard part isn't solving problems, but deciding what problems to solve.
quotes.author: Paul Graham

quotes.quote: Programming is the art of telling another human what one wants the computer to do.
quotes.author: Donald Knuth

quotes.quote: Without requirements or design, programming is the art of adding bugs to an empty quote file.
quotes.author: Louis Srygley

quotes.quote: Good code is its own best documentation.
quotes.author: Steve McConnell

quotes.quote: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.
quotes.author: Donald Knuth

quotes.quote: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed on Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday's code.
quotes.author: Dan Salomon

quotes.quote: The best way to get a project done faster is to start sooner.
quotes.author: Jim Highsmith

quotes.quote: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it.
quotes.author: Patrick McKenzie

quotes.quote: There are two ways to write error-free programs; only the third one works.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: Testing leads to failure, and failure leads to understanding.
quotes.author: Burt Rutan

quotes.quote: Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
quotes.author: John Woods

quotes.quote: Software is a great combination between artistry and engineering.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.quote: It's harder to read code than to write it.
quotes.author: Joel Spolsky

quotes.quote: The best programs are the ones written when the programmer is supposed to be working on something else.
quotes.author: Melinda Varian

quotes.quote: Writing code is easy. Writing code that works is hard.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Simplicity is prerequisite for reliability.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Design patterns should not be applied indiscriminately. Often they achieve flexibility and variability by introducing additional levels of indirection, and that can complicate a design.
quotes.author: Gang of Four

quotes.quote: The cheapest, fastest, and most reliable components are those that aren't there.
quotes.author: Gordon Bell

quotes.quote: Java is to JavaScript what car is to carpet.
quotes.author: Chris Heilmann

quotes.quote: I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits.
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.quote: The trouble with programmers is that you can never tell what a programmer is doing until it's too late.
quotes.author: Seymour Cray

quotes.quote: Software and cathedrals are much the same – first we build them, then we pray.
quotes.author: Sam Redwine

quotes.quote: The best thing about a boolean is even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There's no place like 127.0.0.1.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It works on my machine.
quotes.author: Every Developer

quotes.quote: Weeks of coding can save you hours of planning.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A good programmer is someone who always looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.
quotes.author: Doug Linder

quotes.quote: Copy-and-paste was programmed by programmers for programmers.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Programming is 10% science, 20% ingenuity, and 70% getting the ingenuity to work with the science.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Software undergoes beta testing shortly before it's released. Beta is Latin for 'still doesn't work'.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Real programmers don't comment their code. If it was hard to write, it should be hard to understand.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I don't care if it works on your machine! We are not shipping your machine!
quotes.author: Vidiu Platon

quotes.quote: To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer.
quotes.author: Paul R. Ehrlich

quotes.quote: Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots.
quotes.author: Rick Cook

quotes.quote: Always code as if the person who ends up maintaining your code is a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
quotes.author: Martin Golding

quotes.quote: Documentation is like sex: when it's good, it's very good, and when it's bad, it's better than nothing.
quotes.author: Dick Brandon

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of programming languages: those people always complain about and those nobody uses.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: In theory, theory and practice are the same. In practice, they're not.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The best performance improvement is the transition from the nonworking state to the working state.
quotes.author: John Ousterhout

quotes.quote: Programmers are tools for converting caffeine into code.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hofstadter's Law: It always takes longer than you expect, even when you take into account Hofstadter's Law.
quotes.author: Douglas Hofstadter

quotes.quote: Some people, when confronted with a problem, think 'I know, I'll use regular expressions.' Now they have two problems.
quotes.author: Jamie Zawinski

quotes.quote: Debugging is like being the detective in a crime movie where you are also the murderer.
quotes.author: Filipe Fortes

quotes.quote: A programmer had a problem. He thought, I'll use threads! has Now problems. two he
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Algorithm: A word used by programmers when they don't want to explain what they did.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The first 90% of the code accounts for the first 90% of the development time. The remaining 10% of the code accounts for the other 90% of the development time.
quotes.author: Tom Cargill

quotes.quote: Writing the first 90 percent of a computer program takes 90 percent of the time. The remaining ten percent also takes 90 percent of the time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Software is like entropy: It is difficult to grasp, weighs nothing, and obeys the Second Law of Thermodynamics.
quotes.author: Norman Augustine

quotes.quote: A user interface is like a joke. If you have to explain it, it's not that good.
quotes.author: Martin LeBlanc

quotes.quote: If you think good architecture is expensive, try bad architecture.
quotes.author: Brian Foote

quotes.quote: It's not a bug, it's a feature.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Give a man a program, frustrate him for a day. Teach a man to program, frustrate him for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Muhammad Waseem

quotes.quote: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A SQL query walks into a bar, walks up to two tables and asks, 'Can I join you?'
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Programming is like writing a book, except if you miss a single comma on page 126, the whole thing makes no sense.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Behind every great programmer is an even greater de-bugger.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best thing about a boolean is even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Code reuse is the Holy Grail of Software Engineering.
quotes.author: Douglas Crockford

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, call it version 1.0.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A computer lets you make more mistakes faster than any invention in human history, with the possible exceptions of handguns and tequila.
quotes.author: Mitch Ratcliffe

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to implement it.
quotes.author: David Heinemeier Hansson

quotes.quote: Software is a gas; it expands to fill its container.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.quote: Code is read more than it is written.
quotes.author: Guido van Rossum

quotes.quote: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but rather when there is nothing more to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.quote: Software is a great combination of artistry and engineering.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention of its user.
quotes.author: C.A.R. Hoare

quotes.quote: Every programmer is an author.
quotes.author: Sercan Leylek

quotes.quote: The computer programmer is a creator of universes for which he alone is responsible.
quotes.author: Joseph Weizenbaum

quotes.quote: One person's crappy software is another person's full-time job.
quotes.author: Jessica Gaston

quotes.quote: The best code is no code at all.
quotes.author: Jeff Atwood

quotes.quote: Testing can only prove the presence of bugs, not their absence.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: A primary cause of complexity is that software vendors uncritically adopt almost any feature that users want.
quotes.author: Niklaus Wirth

quotes.quote: An evolving system increases its complexity unless work is done to reduce it.
quotes.author: Meir Lehman

quotes.quote: Sometimes the problem is to discover what the problem is.
quotes.author: Gordon Glegg

quotes.quote: Computers are good at following instructions, but not at reading your mind.
quotes.author: Donald Knuth

quotes.quote: The purpose of software engineering is to control complexity, not to create it.
quotes.author: Pamela Zave

quotes.quote: Code that is not tested cannot be expected to work.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The sooner you start to code, the longer the program will take.
quotes.author: Roy Carlson

quotes.quote: Bad programmers worry about the code. Good programmers worry about data structures and their relationships.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: When debugging, novices insert corrective code; experts remove defective code.
quotes.author: Richard Pattis

quotes.quote: Simplicity is hard to build, easy to use, and hard to charge for. Complexity is easy to build, hard to use, and easy to charge for.
quotes.author: Chris Sacca

quotes.quote: The key to performance is elegance, not battalions of special cases.
quotes.author: Jon Bentley

quotes.quote: Good design adds value faster than it adds cost.
quotes.author: Thomas C. Gale

quotes.quote: The value of a prototype is in the education it gives you, not in the code itself.
quotes.author: Alan Cooper

quotes.quote: Code without tests is broken by design.
quotes.author: Jacob Kaplan-Moss

quotes.quote: The best engineers I know are artists at heart.
quotes.author: Satya Nadella

quotes.quote: Software is like gardening - you have to keep tending it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Learning to program has no more to do with designing interactive software than learning to touch type has to do with writing poetry.
quotes.author: Ted Nelson

quotes.quote: The difference between theory and practice is that in theory, there is no difference between theory and practice.
quotes.author: Richard Moore

quotes.quote: As a programmer, never underestimate your ability to come up with ridiculously complex solutions for simple problems.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuchs

quotes.quote: You can't have great software without a great team.
quotes.author: Joel Spolsky

quotes.quote: The art of programming is the art of organizing complexity.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Software is getting slower more rapidly than hardware becomes faster.
quotes.author: Niklaus Wirth

quotes.quote: The most effective debugging tool is still careful thought, coupled with judiciously placed print statements.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Innovation is not about saying yes to everything. It's about saying no to all but the most crucial features.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Complexity kills. It sucks the life out of developers, it makes products difficult to plan, build, and test.
quotes.author: Ray Ozzie

quotes.quote: You should name a variable using the same care with which you name a first-born child.
quotes.author: Robert C. Martin

quotes.quote: Every line of code is written without reason, maintained out of weakness, and deleted by chance.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the programming field more despicable than an undocumented program.
quotes.author: Edward Yourdon

quotes.quote: The management question, therefore, is not whether to build a pilot system and throw it away. You will do that.
quotes.author: Frederick P. Brooks Jr.

quotes.quote: We build our computer systems the way we build our cities: over time, without a plan, on top of ruins.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.quote: A program that produces incorrect results twice as fast is infinitely slower.
quotes.author: John Osterhout

quotes.quote: The best way to get accurate information on Usenet is to post something wrong and wait for corrections.
quotes.author: Matthew Austern

quotes.quote: Software developers like to solve problems. If there are no problems handily available, they will create their own problems.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Good software, like wine, takes time.
quotes.author: Joel Spolsky

quotes.quote: The greatest single programming dichotomy is not syntax vs. semantics, nor top-down vs. bottom-up, but development vs. maintenance.
quotes.author: Danny Kalev

quotes.quote: Don't worry if it doesn't work right. If everything did, you'd be out of a job.
quotes.author: Mosher's Law

quotes.quote: A well-written program is its own heaven; a poorly-written program is its own hell.
quotes.author: The Tao of Programming

quotes.quote: Computer science education cannot make anybody an expert programmer any more than studying brushes and pigment can make somebody an expert painter.
quotes.author: Eric S. Raymond

quotes.quote: Everyone knows that debugging is twice as hard as writing a program in the first place. So if you're as clever as you can be when you write it, how will you ever debug it?
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Software testing is like a party: the later you get there, the more you'll regret it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The code you write makes you a programmer. The code you delete makes you a good one. The code you don't have to write makes you a great one.
quotes.author: Mario Fusco

quotes.quote: Programming isn't about syntax - it's about problem solving.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Writing software is easy. Writing good software is hard.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's not at all important to get it right the first time. It's vitally important to get it right the last time.
quotes.author: Andrew Hunt

quotes.quote: Inside every large program is a small program struggling to get out.
quotes.author: C.A.R. Hoare

quotes.quote: The most dangerous phrase in the language is: 'We've always done it this way.'
quotes.author: Grace Hopper
